The shearling lining accentuates the footwear’s sense of coziness, while the wide band made of fine rows of delicate monili creates a radiant stripe, giving the boots an elegant touch. The rubber bottom provides the fit with added comfort.

Light grooves on the TPU heel counter insert and the back of the two-tone outsole complete this style with elegant details.
